hex
Class hexChip

java.lang.Object
  online.common.StockArt
      online.game.chip
          hex.hexChip
All Implemented Interfaces:
HexConstants, DrawableSprite, PlayConstants, Play2Constants
public class hexChip
extends chip
implements HexConstants

this is a specialization of chip to represent the stones used by hex; and also other tiles, borders and other images that are used to draw the board.

Author:
ddyer

Method Detail

chipNumber

public int chipNumber()

preloadImages

public static void preloadImages(exCanvas forcan,
                                 java.lang.String Dir)
this is a fairly standard preloadImages method, called from the game initialization. It loads the images into the stack of chips we've built

Parameters:
forcan - the canvas for which we are loading the images.
Dir - the directory to find the image files.
